metadata.title: CVE-2013-4488 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: libgadu before 1.12.0 does not verify X.509 certificates from SSL servers, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers.

notes.note: mdeslaur> we build with the gnutls backend upstream certs don't actually match host names used, so correct cert validation is difficult.

criterions.comment: libgadu package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
